member.name: IWICColorContext.GetExifColorSpace
member.summary: Retrieves the Exchangeable Image File (EXIF) color space color context.

param.name: pValue
param.para: A pointer that receives the EXIF color space color context.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICColorContext.GetProfileBytes
member.param: The size of the pbBuffer buffer.
A pointer that receives the color context profile.
A pointer that receives the actual buffer size needed to retrieve the entire color context profile.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICColorContext.GetType
member.param: A pointer that receives the of the color context.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICColorContext.InitializeFromExifColorSpace
member.summary: Initializes the color context using an Exchangeable Image File (EXIF) color space.

param.name: value
param.para: The value of the EXIF color space.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICColorContext.InitializeFromFilename
member.summary: Initializes the color context from the given file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICColorContext.InitializeFromMemory
member.summary: Initializes the color context from a memory block.
member.param: The buffer used to initialize the .
The size of the pbBuffer buffer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
